strings.ship.ship_car.name: The Car
strings.ship.ship_car.desc: High power, slow missiles. Paint attack.
strings.ship.ship_plane.name: The Plane
strings.ship.ship_witch.name: The Witch
strings.ship.ship_supercar.name: The Supercar
strings.ship.ship_supercar.desc: Low power, very fast missiles. Homing attack.
strings.inventory_full_warning_level_select: ‚ö† Inventory full ({current}/{max}): recycle items before starting a level.
strings.ship_menu_multi_recycle_confirm: Are you sure you want to recycle {count} item{item_suffix} for a total of {crystals} crystals?
strings.skills.menu.title: SKILLS
strings.skills.menu.info.magic_choose: Choose a magic branch (Cryo, Toxin, or Singularity).
strings.skills.menu.info.pew_ready: Perfection: repeatable points to boost your stats.
strings.skills.skill.frozen_1.title: Frostbite Shots
strings.skills.skill.frozen_1.description: Projectiles turn ice-blue. Each impact slows enemies by 15% (stacks x3).
strings.skills.skill.frozen_2.title: Arctic Aura
strings.skills.skill.frozen_2.description: A permanent frost aura surrounds your ship. Enemies inside are slowed.
strings.skills.skill.frozen_3.title: Deep Freeze
strings.skills.skill.frozen_3.description: Enemies that stay 2s in the aura or take 10 hits are frozen (immobile) for 2s.
strings.skills.skill.frozen_4.title: Ice Shards
strings.skills.skill.frozen_4.description: Shooting a frozen enemy shatters ice shards that damage nearby enemies (AoE).
strings.skills.skill.frozen_5.title: Blizzard
strings.skills.skill.frozen_5.description: Increases aura radius by 50% and applies a cold DoT to frozen enemies.
strings.skills.skill.poison_1.title: Venom Rounds
strings.skills.skill.poison_1.description: Projectiles turn green. Applies a DoT equal to 20% hit damage over 3s.
strings.skills.skill.poison_2.title: Toxic Pool
strings.skills.skill.poison_2.description: If a missile does not kill or crits, it leaves a toxic pool that deals damage.
strings.skills.skill.poison_3.title: Contagion
strings.skills.skill.poison_3.description: Enemies that die while poisoned explode and poison nearby enemies.
strings.skills.skill.poison_4.title: Corrosive Acid
strings.skills.skill.poison_4.description: Poison also reduces enemy armor: direct hits deal 25% more damage.
strings.skills.skill.poison_5.title: Plague Spreader
strings.skills.skill.poison_5.description: Increases toxic pool size by 50% and DoT duration by 2s.
strings.skills.skill.void_1.title: Gravity Bolts
strings.skills.skill.void_1.description: Projectiles turn purple/black. Slight pull on impact.
strings.skills.skill.void_2.title: Singularity Chance
strings.skills.skill.void_2.description: 10% chance on impact to create a mini black hole that attracts enemies for 1s.
strings.skills.skill.void_3.title: Event Horizon
strings.skills.skill.void_3.description: Increases attraction radius of all void effects by 50%.
strings.skills.skill.void_4.title: Spaghettification
strings.skills.skill.void_4.description: Enemies closer to the black hole center take exponentially more damage.
strings.skills.skill.void_5.title: Void Walker
strings.skills.skill.void_5.description: Your ship gains a passive aura that slightly makes enemy projectiles orbit around you.
strings.skills.skill.loot_1.title: Lucky Charm
strings.skills.skill.loot_2.title: Crystal Magnet
strings.skills.skill.loot_3.title: Appraiser
strings.skills.skill.loot_3.description: Increases chance that dropped items have higher rarity.
strings.skills.skill.loot_4.title: Recycler
strings.skills.skill.loot_5.title: Jackpot
strings.skills.skill.loot_5.description: Bosses have a 25% chance to drop an additional item.
strings.skills.skill.powers_1.title: Vacuum
strings.skills.skill.powers_1.description: Auto-pickup: nearby items fly toward the player.
strings.skills.skill.powers_2.title: Shield Reflector
strings.skills.skill.powers_2.description: Active shield has a 10% chance to reflect enemy projectiles.
strings.skills.skill.powers_3.title: Power Extender
strings.skills.skill.powers_3.description: Temporary power-ups (fire rate boost, etc.) last 2s longer.
strings.skills.skill.powers_4.title: Overcharge
strings.skills.skill.powers_5.title: Emergency Protocol
strings.skills.skill.powers_5.description: When shield breaks, emits a shockwave that pushes enemies back (20s cooldown).
strings.skills.skill.paragon_damage.title: Raw Power
strings.skills.skill.paragon_hp.title: Vitality
strings.skills.skill.paragon_shield.title: Flux Capacity
strings.skills.skill.paragon_crit.title: Precision
strings.skills.skill.paragon_fire_rate.title: Haste
